title: Iron Man
description: A billionaire industrialist and genius inventor becomes the armored superhero Iron Man.

title: Black Widow
description: A former KGB assassin confronts her past while fighting a sinister conspiracy.

title: John Wick
description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to exact revenge on the people who wronged him.

title: Harry Potter
description: A young wizard attends Hogwarts and battles the dark lord Voldemort.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to restore his secret identity, unleashing chaos.

title: Wonder Woman
description: Diana, an Amazon warrior, leaves her home to end war and discover her true powers.

title: Euphoria
description: Teenagers navigate love, trauma, and identity in a visually stunning, raw high school drama.

title: No Time to Die
description: Bond comes out of retirement for one last mission, joined by a deadly CIA agent.
